summary: This MOD adds some hairstyles to playable presets of vanilla.
descriptionHtml:
[size=+1][b]Announcements [/b][/size]
[color=#88ccff]Starting with version 6, this MOD become the only edition that adjusted reduce the shine.[/color]
BSA edition seemed not work well, so I removed it. Sorry. x(
Instead of that, I added ESM edition.
If you want to apply these styles to the NPC, try the ESM edition.
[size=+1][b]Description [/b][/size]
This MOD adds some hairstyles to playable presets of vanilla.
The range to be applied is same as vanilla Nord hair.
[line]
BDMods has made an amazing video. Thanks! ;D
[youtube]wvJM4CuyuyE[/youtube]
[line]
[color=#eeaa44]The version of this MOD means a number of kind of styles.[/color]
[color=#55ff88]Currently there are [b]8[/b] styles.[/color]
-------------------------------------------------------------
[b]4[/b] for the [color=#77aaff]male[/color]
[b]4[/b] for the [color=#ff7799]female[/color]
-------------------------------------------------------------
I just simply changed the shape of the vanilla hair meshes.
So, the data size is same as vanilla ones. 
I think it\'s slightly lore-friendly and substantially low-spec-friendly. ;)
[line]
[size=+1][b]Required [/b][/size]
This MOD is not depend on any other MODs.
[size=+1][b]Notes[/b][/size]
[color=#eeee55]If you have been using the MOD replace the vanilla hairstyle in the past, there may be the possibility of conflict.[/color]
[size=+1][b]Install[/b][/size]
I recommend NMM-install/unistall.
If manually:
- extract RAR file [VHVP***.rar]
- Overwrites the [VHVP***\\Data] to [Skyrim\\Data]. 
- Click on the \'Data Files\' of Skyrim Launcher and enable [VHVP.esp].
[size=+1][b]Uninstall[/b][/size]
If manually:
- Disable ESP with Skyrim Launcher.
- Delete the folders and files below.
Data\\VHVP.esp
Data\\Meshes\\actors\\character\\character assets\\hair\\female\\VHVP_***
Data\\Meshes\\actors\\character\\character assets\\hair\\male\\VHVP_***
Data\\textures\\actors\\character\\Hair\\omghair***
[size=+1][b]Credits[/b][/size]
Thanks to Bethesda for creating Skyrim.
[size=+1][b]About permission[/b][/size]
[color=#aaffaa]Please feel free to use data that is included in my MOD.
My permission is not necessary.[/color]
[line]
[b]My other MOD[/b]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26112]AngeLydia -Lydia is reborn-[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27955]Lovely Jessica - Standalone -[/url]
[line]
[size=+1]I hope your Skyrim-life will be more fun! ;D[/size]
author: Omega99jp
